summary: Buffs the skeleton for Beast Races (so far only Khajiit and Argonian male)
descriptionHtml:
I was recently searching for the mod "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6239/?]A Better body scale for Khajiit and Argonian Male[/url]" and noticed, that the newest version, still is the old edited vanilla skeleton. I looked up on the authors profile just to see, that his last activity was in 2012. So I decided to recreate the skeleton myself and a little bit of extra buff.
So here you see the new "Bulky Body Shape for Khajiit and Argonian Male".
Even if the original mod was just an edit of the values of some skeleton nodes, I still want to credit [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/1969489/?]nockchaa[/url] (alias TS), cause his mod was clearly the inspiration to this one.
The skeleton is the XPMSE (SoS compatibilty yay!) with vanilla weapons placement.

At the moment there are two versions available. One, that uses the original values, and one with a more buffed torso. 

[b]Requirements:[/b]
[list][*]Groovtama's xp32 skeleton edit v2.4x [/*]
[*][b]There weren't any skeleton changes since some time now, so you can use this skeleton even with newer versions of Groovtama's mod without worrying. I will update the mod as soon as Groovtama updates the skeleton itself. [/b][/*]
[*][b]Skeleton still compatible with XPMSE 2.42 cause no skeleton changes till now ;)[/b][/*]
[/list]
[b]Installation:[/b]
[list][*]Download XPMSE 2.4x and install it. Then overwrite its skeletonbeast.nif under character assets with my edited one[/*]
[/list]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[list][*]nockchaa/TS[/*]
[*]xp32[/*]
[*]Groovtama[/*]
[/list]
[b]Mirror:[/b]
[list][*][url=https://mega.co.nz/#F!ggxylRpa!JzIgVs_UP1ZtesIRurAJag]Bulky Skeleton for Beast Races[/url] (Mega Folder)[/*]
[/list]
[b]Future plans:[/b][list][*]In addition to that, I am going to make a female version of this. I am going to add the values of the Beasty male skeleton to the female ones, so you can crush enemy heads with your bulky reptilian amazon queen! [/*]
[/list]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] 
[list][*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50802/?]Catlike Khajiit[/url] (Lion/ess head) [/*]
[*]BAM - Brutish Argonian Mal [/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56623/?]SC - Khajiit Improvement[/url] [/*]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42043/?]FAR - Forgotten Argonian Roots[/url] [/*]
[/list]

For detailed permission infos go onto[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?] the xp32 file page[/url] and read the permissions there.
author: sheothemadone PaganWitcher
